page.title: 17Life styles in Sth Benfleet.
page.content: A popular pastime is gardening, despite the fact that in South Benfleet the soil is clay,which is heavy in winter and dry as rock in summer."Stiff,tough,dumb,numb and impervious",a local farmer once described it.Most houses have gardens to the front and rear and many gardens have large lawns and ornamental flower beds.The growing of fruit and vegetables for personal consumption is popular again,as people are becoming aware of the harmful additives in shop_bought food,but young people in particular like the convenience of buying meals out, which they can do in "Wimpy_Bars",Public Houses and Restaurants or to take prepared meals home,for which the numerous "Take_ aways" cater.Apart from Fish and Chip shops,there are several Indian and Chinese "Take_Aways" and Restaurants.
